panels.description: It shows the total completed jobs by customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Total Completed Jobs

panels.description: It shows the overall rate of Jobs executed in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Overall - Success Rate

panels.description:
it shows an overall average queue time to get runners provisioned for customers.

We consider healthy keeping it under 30 seconds.
panels.title: Overall - Average Queue Time

panels.description: It shows the median job completion time for Linux runners in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Overall - Completion Time

panels.description: It shows the timeline of completed workflows per customer (GitHub Organisation) in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Workflows - Execution per Organisation

panels.description: It shows the mean usage per label for all customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Average - Usage per Label

panels.description:
it shows an average queue time to get runners provisioned for customers per label (warm pools).

We consider healthy keeping it under 30 seconds.

If any label presents average time frequently over 30 seconds, we should consider review the Pool  dimensioning.
panels.title: Average - Queue Time per Label

panels.description: It shows the average queued time to provision a runner for Linux Customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Linux - Average - Queued Time Over Time

panels.description: It shows the average queued time to provision a runner for macOS Customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: macOS - Average - Queued Time Over Time

panels.description: It shows the timeline of runners provisioned for jobs executed by customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Overall Usage per Label

panels.description: It shows the median queued time to provision a runner for Linux Customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Linux - Queued Time

panels.description: It shows the median job completion time for Linux runners in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: Linux - Completion Time

panels.description: It shows the availability versus in use for macOS runners in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: macOS - Availability x Usage

panels.description: It shows the median queued time to provision a runner for macOS Customers in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: macOS - Queued Time

panels.description: It shows the allocation of macOS runner on the available hosts.
panels.title: macOS - Runners Allocation

panels.description: It shows the median job completion time for macOS runners in a defined timeframe.
panels.title: macOS - Completion time

panels.description: It shows the allocation of macOS runner on the available hosts.
panels.title: macOS - Runners allocation over time
